songs.title: Heart Attack
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Harry]
Baby you got me sick, I don't know what I did
Need to take a break and figure it out, yeah
Got your voice in my head
Saying, "Let's just be friends"
Can't believe the words came outta your mouth, yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Zayn]
I'm tryna be okay, I'm tryna be alright
But seeing you with him
Just don't feel right

[Chorus: Harry & All & (Niall)]
And I'm like
(Ow!), never thought it'd hurt so bad
Getting over you
And (ow!), you're giving me a heart attack
Looking like you do
'Cause you're all I ever wanted
Thought you would be the one
And (ow!), giving me a heart attack
Getting over you

[Verse 2: Liam & Niall]
Yeah, baby, now that you're gone
I can't stand dumb love songs
Missing you is all I'm thinking about, yeah
Everyone's telling me, I'm just too blind to see
How you messed me up, I'm better off now, yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Zayn]
I'm tryna be okay, I'm tryna be alright
But seeing you with him
Just don't feel right

[Chorus: Harry & All & (Niall)]
And I'm like
(Ow!), never thought it'd hurt so bad
Getting over you
And (ow!), you're giving me a heart attack
Looking like you do
'Cause you're all I ever wanted
Thought you would be the one
And (ow!), giving me a heart attack
Getting over you

[Bridge: Louis & (Niall)]
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, (ow!)
Yeah, every time you look like that, (ow!)
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, (ow!)
You're giving me a heart attack

[Breakdown: Louis]
But seeing you with him
Just don't feel right

[Chorus: Harry & All & Zayn &(Niall)]
And I'm like
(Ow!), never thought it'd hurt so bad
(Never thought it would hurt so bad)
Getting over you
And (ow!), you're giving me a heart attack
(You're giving me a heart attack)
Looking like you do
'Cause you're all I ever wanted
Thought you would be the one
And ([ow!(15026840)]), giving me a heart attack
Getting over you

[Outro: Harry & All & Zayn &[(Niall)]]
You, you're all I ever wanted (ow!)
Yeah, every time you look like that (ow!)
Come on, you're all I ever wanted(ow!)
You're giving me a heart attack, (ow!)
